text: Barrow-in-Furness is a town in south Cumbria (England), connected by the A590 road. The old town and seaport form about half of the modern Borough of Barrow-in-Furness. Before 1 April 1974, Barrow was in Lancashire. ==Other websites== *Borough of Barrow-in-Furness Council Category:Port cities and towns of England Category:Towns in Cumbria
title: Barrow-in-Furness
